ai.persona: The Hollow Wastes are what remains when the Void touches the world. Once fertile lands, now a nightmarish expanse where the laws of nature bend and break. The sky is wrong here—stars that shouldn't exist, a sun that gives no warmth. The corrupted wander its expanse: twisted creatures that were once human, elven, or worse. At its heart, something stirs—the source of the corruption, patient and hungry.

atmosphere.visual: Impossible geometry, void-black tears in reality, corrupted flora and fauna
sounds: silence that presses on the mind

rumors: The Void remembers the time before the gods
Those who enter can be saved—if reached in time
The Hollow Wastes are growing faster

voice.speech_patterns: The corrupted speak in fragments of their former selves, mixed with void-speech that hurts to hear.
